name: DropSimetricoPreparate
description: Make Player 1 and Player 2 jump at the same time!

both-players-left.name: Both Players Left
both-players-left.description: Make both players move to the left.

both-players-right.name: Both Players Right
both-players-right.description: Make both players move to the right.
